comment: Very good at explaining lectures and thorough with everything
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: 10/10 easy as long as you study

Epp is the best patho professor! Her lectures are heavy with 100+ slides, but everything on the exams are based on the ppts which is why they are soooo much. Exams are MC, T/F, and SATA. Attendance is mandatory for points, but you can miss up to 3 days without penalty. DO THE QUESTIONS OF THE DAY & CASE STUDIES, this will guarantee an A! Goodluck!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Lecture heavy

comment: This teacher did a good job imo. This is supposed to be one of the harder nursing classes, but almost everyone got at least a B. There are a lot of extra points outside of tests, and if you come to class and read the PowerPoint, you'll be fine.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I don't recommend this professor! Patho is a very hard class and she just makes it harder. She is a really nice lady but she's not good at making sure everyone understands. Almost every powerpoint is 100 + slides weekly, while the other patho class (steppe class) only has 70-80 slides. She puts way too many things on her slides that is not needed.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things
